snippet: Dr. Roger M. Perlmutter, the former research head of Amgen, will replace Peter S. Kim, who is retiring after a number of successes and some recent disappointments.
abstract: Merck announces that it will replace head of research Peter S Kim with Dr Roger M Perlmutter, former research head at Amgen; shift follows 3 percent stock decline after company announced delayed approval of osteoporosis drug.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Roger M. Perlmutter, the former research head of Amgen, will replace Peter S. Kim, who is retiring after a number of successes and some recent disappointments.

headline.seo: Merck Replaces Peter Kim, Its Research Chief
